::Hunter::

A Maximal space cruiser appears above the planet Earth with a bright 
flash, flying down into the atmosphere. Inside, the pilot swears, 
trying to stabolize the ship.

He had been following Killfest's pod, and it had recently fallen into 
a transwarp portal. He had followed, but his ship couldn't stand the 
energy strain and he was forced to leave the portal early.

"Slag," he swears, watching the planet rush up at him. He pushes a few 
buttons. The ship was not functioning, there was only one option left.

"Edject!"

The ship was well in the atmosphere, the sides of it burning up. The 
top opens, making the ship much less air dinamic.

The Maximal's seat launches upwards, clearing the ship and leaving it 
to fall to the ground and explode. Hunter himself lands safely, about 
a mile away from the Predac
